name: Leather Boots
description: Comfortable boots made of high-quality leather.
looks: The leather boots are ankle-length and have a lace-up closure. They are made from brown leather and have a cushioned sole for added comfort.

name: Flaming Sword
description: A deadly sword imbued with the power of fire.
looks: The Flaming Sword has a long, slender blade with fiery patterns etched into the metal. The hilt is made from blackened steel and is adorned with intricate carvings of flames.

special_weapon_skils.fire_mastery: Increases fire damage and critical hit chance.

special_effects.burning: Has a chance to ignite enemies, dealing additional fire damage over time.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic iron sword, suitable for beginners.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a double-edged design. The hilt is made of wood and wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: A heavy and durable armor made from steel plates.
looks: The steel plate armor is composed of thick steel plates that cover the entire body. It has detailed engravings and sturdy straps that hold the plates in place.

name: Rusty Iron Sword
description: An old and rusty iron sword that has seen better days.
looks: The rusty iron sword has a dull and corroded blade. The hilt is worn and the handle is wrapped in fraying leather.

name: Iron Sword
description: A simple iron sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The iron sword has a straight, double-edged blade with a sharp point. The hilt is made of leather and wrapped in a rough cloth for a better grip.

name: Silver Blade
description: An elegant and finely crafted sword made from pure silver.
looks: The Silver Blade has a polished silver blade that gleams in the light. The hilt is made from engraved silver and wrapped in soft leather for a comfortable grip.

special_effects.silver_blade: Deals additional damage to creatures weak to silver.

name: Enchanted Staff
description: A mystical staff imbued with powerful enchantments
looks: The staff is made of polished oak wood and is adorned with intricate carvings and glowing runes. At the top, a large crystal radiates a soft light.

special_weapon_skills.elemental_magic: Allows the user to cast powerful elemental magic spells.

name: Silver Ring
description: A simple silver ring that can be worn on any finger.
looks: The silver ring is a plain band of polished silver. It has a smooth texture with no engravings or embellishments.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic iron sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade and a simple, hilt made of leather. The blade is engraved with intricate designs and has a shiny polished finish.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when used.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Master Sword
description: A legendary sword said to be the chosen weapon of the Hero. It has the power to vanquish evil.
looks: The Master Sword has a gleaming blade made of enchanted steel, adorned with runes and symbols of ancient power. The hilt is made of polished gold, with a blue gemstone embedded at its pommel.

name: Excalibur
description: A legendary sword said to have been wielded by King Arthur himself
looks: Excalibur is a magnificent sword with a golden hilt and a gleaming blade. The hilt is decorated with intricate engravings and the blade is perfectly balanced.

special_effects.divine_blessing: Occasionally heals the wielder when landing a critical hit

name: Healing Potion
description: A small vial of potent healing potion that can restore health.
looks: The healing potion is contained in a transparent glass vial with a cork stopper. The liquid inside is a bright green color.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The iron sword has a long, straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is made of wood and wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.
